original_text: Perceiving then that they were about to come and take him by force to make him king, Jesus withdrew again to the mountain by himself.
korean_text: 그러므로 예수께서 그들이 와서 자기를 억지로 붙들어 임금으로 삼으려는 줄 아시고 다시 혼자 산으로 떠나 가시니라

sentences.original_text: that they were about to come and take him by force
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 와서 억지로 그를 잡으려 한다는 것을
